attributes.action: Build the Severn Barrage to provide vast quantities of clean electricity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Severn Estuary has the second highest tidal range in the world.  The proposed tidal barrage between England and Wales would generate enough electricity to close a number of coal/gas/nuclear (you choose) power stations.

Wind turbines could also be built along it's length to further increase output.

Additionally it could carry a railway line, saving a long detour and creating a new strategic and economic link.
